metadata.creator: Rodrigo C. Lim
metadata.description:
In this book are the pictures of and biographies of over one hundred Chinese residents in the Philippines. The author has endeavored to include human representative types of Chinese businessmen of the old as well as the young generation, who have been, and are contributing very much to the economic and industrial development of this country.
Please use the citation below:
Lim R. C. (1930). Who's Who in the Philippines (Chinese Edition). Retrieved from https://archive.org/details/WhosWhoInThePhilippinesChineseEdition
metadata.scanner: Presidential Communications Development and Strategic Planning Office
metadata.subject: chinese
metadata.title: Who's Who In The Philippines, Chinese Edition
